titles.title: Smarter Funding for All of America's Homeland Security Act of 2007
To authorize the Secretary of Homeland Security to make grants to first responders, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, the Judiciary, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
